workflow.name: Automated video analysis: AI-powered insight generation from Google Drive
workflow.description:
# Automated Video Analysis: AI-Powered Insight Generation from Google Drive

**Subtitle:** From Google Drive Upload ‚Üí Gemini AI ‚Üí Video Insights

---

### üåç Overview

This workflow automates the **analysis of videos stored in Google Drive**.
It downloads a video, validates it, sends it to **Google Gemini AI** for analysis, and returns a **structured summary** of the content.

Think of it as your **AI-powered video analyst** that works on schedule.

---

## üü¢ Section 1: Trigger ‚Äì Start the Workflow

üîó **Node:** `Schedule Trigger`

* Runs the workflow automatically at a defined interval (e.g., daily).
* Eliminates the need to manually start each run.

üí° **Why useful?**
Keeps analysis consistent without human intervention.

---

## üü¶ Section 2: Download Video

üîó **Node:** `Download Video from Drive`

* Connects to Google Drive.
* Fetches the video file you want to analyze.

üí° **Why useful?**
Pulls the raw video directly from storage ‚Üí no manual download needed.

---

## üü£ Section 3: Prepare for AI Analysis

üîó **Nodes:**

* `Basic LLM Chain` ‚Üí Prepares a structured prompt for Gemini.
* `Google Gemini Chat Model` ‚Üí Defines Gemini as the **AI engine** for analysis.

üí° **Why useful?**
Ensures that Gemini gets both the **video file + clear instructions** on what to analyze (e.g., "Please provide a summary").

---

## üü° Section 4: Validate File Status

üîó **Node:** `Check File Status`

* Confirms that the video file is uploaded and ready to be processed by Gemini‚Äôs API.

üí° **Why useful?**
Prevents wasted runs by making sure the file exists and is accessible before analysis.

---

## üîµ Section 5: AI Video Analysis

üîó **Node:** `Analyze Video`

* Sends the video file to Gemini (via API request).
* Asks Gemini to **analyze and summarize** the video.

üí° **Why useful?**
Extracts insights from video content automatically ‚Äî no need to watch manually.

üì© **Example Output:**

> "The video shows a product demo highlighting three features: speed, security, and collaboration. The speaker explains how the software reduces manual tasks. Ending includes a call to action for early sign-up."

---

## üü† Section 6: Format Results

üîó **Node:** `Format Analysis Result`

* Structures the Gemini response into clean output.
* Makes it easy to forward results into email, Slack, or reporting tools.

üí° **Why useful?**
Instead of messy raw JSON, you get **clear summaries** ready to share.

---

## üìä Workflow Summary

| Section           | Node(s)                            | Purpose                            | Benefit                      |
| ----------------- | ---------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| üü¢ Trigger        | Schedule Trigger                   | Run workflow on schedule           | Fully automated start        |
| üü¶ Download Video | Google Drive                       | Fetch video from Drive             | Removes manual steps         |
| üü£ Prepare Prompt | Basic LLM Chain, Gemini Chat Model | Structure prompt for AI            | Accurate AI analysis         |
| üü° Validate File  | Check File Status                  | Ensure file is accessible          | Avoids failed runs           |
| üîµ AI Analysis    | Analyze Video                      | Gemini analyzes + summarizes video | Saves hours of manual review |
| üü† Format Output  | Format Analysis Result             | Clean up AI output                 | Ready-to-use summaries       |
| üî¥ Assistance     | Sticky Notes                       | Training + support info            | Beginner-friendly handoff    |

---

## üöÄ Benefits

* **Hands-free analysis** ‚Üí Videos summarized automatically.
* **Saves time** ‚Üí No need to watch entire footage.
* **Reliable** ‚Üí Validates file before sending to AI.
* **Flexible** ‚Üí Schedule runs (daily, weekly, etc.).
* **Scalable** ‚Üí Works for 1 video or 1,000.
* **Beginner-friendly** ‚Üí Includes sticky notes and author support.

---

            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE

    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:

   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
